title: "Azure low-priority VMs become non-existent VMs, replaced by new Spot VMs"
excerpt: "Low-priority VMs had a set price whereas Spot VMs from the likes of AWS and Google vary depending on demand. Azure’s new Spot VMs match that arrangement and also let you set the price you’re willing to pay for a VM."
